Body:
yaml_file = os.path.join('testfile_st.yaml')
yaml_filename = pkg_resources.resource_filename(__name__, yaml_file)
cols_to_get = ['composition', 'Reference', 'apparatus', 'temperature',
    'ignition delay']
c = ChemKED(yaml_filename).get_dataframe(cols_to_get)
csv_file = os.path.join('dataframe_st.csv')
csv_filename = pkg_resources.resource_filename(__name__, csv_file)
converters = {'Ignition Delay': Q_, 'Temperature': Q_, 'Pressure': Q_, 'H2':
    Q_, 'Ar': Q_, 'O2': Q_}
use_cols = ['Apparatus:Kind', 'Apparatus:Institution', 'Apparatus:Facility',
    'Reference:Volume', 'Reference:Journal', 'Reference:Doi',
    'Reference:Authors', 'Reference:Detail', 'Reference:Year',
    'Reference:Pages', 'Temperature', 'Ignition Delay', 'H2', 'Ar', 'O2',
    'Composition:Kind']
df = pd.read_csv(csv_filename, converters=converters, usecols=use_cols)
pdt.assert_frame_equal(c.sort_index(axis=1), df.sort_index(axis=1),
    check_names=True)
